description:
Another edition of our Brew & Brew in Ballard. We will start at Woodland for coffee and then head to the Lucky Envelope.

Friday October 11th, Lucky Envelope is hosting their first ever Teahouse Beer Day. From Lucky Envelope:

"Tea is the most widely consumed beverage in the world! From 2019 Washington Beer Award winning Tea Smoked Helles Lager to the Lychee Black Tea Hazy IPA, tea-infused beers have been some of our most popular small batch beer releases. This event will feature 4 special tea-i
